name: Basketball 2
description:
In the year 20XX, the people of the future decided that basketball was too plain and boring. In order to make the game more exciting, the league agreed to make a new, better game: Basketball 2!

In Basketball 2, the days of "shooting" and "fouls" are long gone. The sport is now a high intensity game of shoving one another and dunking on fools. 

You get to play this new high intensity game through the lens of high octane turn-based combat! Plan five steps ahead of your opponent as you set up sweet chain passes to set up a stylish dunk. Shove your opponent out of bound as you desperately defend you goal! Avoid dangerous obstacles! Have fun! This game is way better than the original! 

Free for download, Basketball 2 is a game of the people! Have fun and get dunking!
